ActorFrame.children: <ActorFrame OnCommand="%SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) maxClamp = 0; self:queuecommand('Increase') end)" IncreaseCommand="%SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) maxClamp = maxClamp + .05; if maxClamp < 1 then self:sleep(.025) self:queuecommand('Increase') end function ActorFrame() File=children[7] end end)" />
